title: Information Description
question: Please describe the types of information being stored by this deliverable
description: The following questions will reference the information you describe here as 'the information' being classified

title: Endanger A Person
question: Could the public release of this information ender the safety of any persons?
description: I.e. The release could cause a person(s) physical harm or death

title: Public Disclosure
question: Could this information be released to the public?
description: I.e. Could we publish this information freely on our website?

title: Media Access
question: Could this information be emailed to the media without consequence to Transport Agency?
description: I.e. Could we freely give this information to the media?

title: Unauthenticated Access
question: Could we allow public users of this system access to this information without authentication?
description: I.e. Can we make this available without authentication online?
